boardgame.name: Province
boardgame.description: Two families vie for power as you settle a new provincial town. Build camps and banks, smithies and harbors and control growth as your town develops!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Province is a two-player game in which you must strategically manage your resources and workers to build, complete goals, and score the most victory points to win! The game features a communal worker pool representing the available workers in your town. Players move their workers to generate resources (Labor and Coin) that are used to build the various Structures, which in turn affect resource generation _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; but your opponent can also move the workers, leaving you without the resources you need!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2014 Golden Geek Best 2-Player Board Game Nominee

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Kickstarter edition. In sealed envelope.
New in sealed envelope

Laboratory (LBL200) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Two families vie for power as you settle a new provincial town. Build camps and banks, smithies and harbors and control growth as your town develops!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Province is a two player game where you must strategically manage your resources and workers to build, complete goals, and score the most victory points to win! The game features a communal worker pool representing the available workers in your town. Players move their workers to generate resources (Labor and Coin) that are used to build the various Structures, which in turn effect resource generation. But your opponent can also move the workers leaving you without the resources you need!

Laboratory (LGL200) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Two families vie for power as you settle a new provincial town. Build camps and banks, smithies and harbors and control growth as your town develops!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Province is a two player game where you must strategically manage your resources and workers to build, complete goals, and score the most victory points to win! The game features a communal worker pool representing the available workers in your town. But your opponent can also move the workers leaving you without the resources you need!
